verbose_text: For example, Xiang et al suggested that fork-head box protein P1 (FOXP1) prevented high glucose induced oxidative stress and ECM accumulation in MCs by inhibiting the activation of the Akt / mammalian target of rapamycin (mTOR) signaling pathway; thus, FOXP1 may be a therapeutic target for the treatment of diabetic nephropathy.
evidence: glucose-induced oxidative stress and ECM accumulation in MCs by inhibiting the activation of the Akt
